intro: This is an interactive educational website for children and parents
siteDescription: Catalog is a comprehensive educational platform that combines fun and learning for children and parents
selectUserTypeSubtitle: Who will be using Catalog today?
childCardDesc: Explore a world of knowledge, educational games and fun activities.
parentCardDesc: Track your child's progress, view reports, and support their success.
childLoginSubtitle: Let's start our fun learning journey.
aboutText: We are an educational platform specialized in providing interactive educational content for children and parents.
aboutSubtitle: A comprehensive educational platform that combines fun and learning
aboutSection1Text: Catalog is a leading educational platform specialized in providing interactive and innovative educational content for children and parents. We believe that learning should be fun and engaging, which is why we designed our platform to combine education and entertainment in one integrated experience.
aboutSection2Text: We strive to be the leading educational platform in the region that combines the latest interactive learning technologies with outstanding educational content. We aim to enable children to learn in a fun and effective way, and help parents better support their children's learning journey.
aboutSection3Text: Our mission is to provide a comprehensive and integrated educational experience that combines:
aboutMission1: Interactive educational content specifically designed for children at different age stages
aboutMission2: Fun educational games that help develop cognitive and creative skills
aboutMission3: Educational resources for parents to help them understand their children's needs and support their growth
aboutMission4: Specialized consultations with experts in education and child development
aboutMission5: A comprehensive library of educational and awareness videos and books
aboutSection4Text: At Catalog, we offer a unique educational experience characterized by:
aboutFeature1: Easy-to-use design suitable for both children and adults
aboutFeature2: Safe and secure content that ensures privacy and security for all users
aboutFeature4: Diverse content covering various educational and parenting areas
aboutFeature5: Continuous support from a team specialized in education and parenting
aboutSection5Text: Join the Catalog family and start a fun and fruitful educational journey. We are here to support you and your child in the learning and growth journey.
contactText: You can contact us via email or phone.
contactSubtitle: We are here to help you and answer all your inquiries
contactSection1Text: You can contact us through the following methods:
contactEmailText: For general inquiries and technical support, you can email us at:
contactPhoneText: For direct contact, you can call us at:
contactHoursText: We are available to answer your inquiries during:
contactHoursValue: Saturday to Thursday: 9 AM to 5 PM
contactSection2Text: Your opinion matters to us! If you have any suggestions or feedback about the platform, or if you encounter any technical issues, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our team is ready to help you at any time.
contactSection3Text: Follow us on social media to get the latest news and updates:
content: This is temporary content. It will be updated later.

coloringGameInstructions: Click on a shape then select a color to fill it. Enjoy coloring!
puzzleInstructions: Click on tiles adjacent to the empty space to move them. Your goal is to arrange numbers from 1 to 8.
matchingGameInstructions: Click on cards to flip them and find matching pairs. Try to find all pairs with the least number of attempts!
